page.title: 13CURRIE MY DAD
page.content: MY DAD IS CALLED TERRY MANN. HE IS 32.HE HAS BLACK CURLY HAIR AND IS WELL BUILT. HE HAS SHORT LEGS AND IS PLUMP AND STRONG. MY DAD'S JOB IS A BUILDER. HE IS CALLED A GENERAL FOREMAN. A FOREMAN IS IN CHARGE OF A LARGE GROUP OF MEN. HIS JOB IS OUT AT LIVINGSTON.HIS HOBBIES ARE BOWLING AND GARDENING. HE LOVES COOKING ON THE BARBECUE AND HE IS VERY HANDY ABOUT THE HOUSE. HE HAS A HABIT WHEN HE IS COMING UP THE ROAD FROM WORK. HE WHISTLES. AND WHEN HE IS AT WORK HE WHISTLES WHEN HE IS WALKING ROUND THE BUILDING SITE AT WORK
